description: Evaluates uploaded resumes against the Platform Engineer JD criteria. Analyzes skills, experience, and qualifications match. If candidate fits, composes and sends an email summary to shreyas+bot@lyzr.ai via Gmail. Displays the full assessment on screen regardless of fit.

result.candidate_name: Full name of the candidate extracted from the resume
result.fit_status: Whether the candidate fits the JD: fit or not_fit

experience_evaluation.summary: Detailed summary of the candidate's relevant experience

result.recommendation: Detailed recommendation text explaining the fit assessment
result.email_summary: Summary of the email sent or reason no email was sent
